Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Alif Lam Ra. Tsino ni tsinyaali tsieshitabu shiamachesi

Koo! Ni kamakana khubandu mbu khwafimbulila Omundu okhurula mubo mbu; “wikanyilisilie Abandu ne osuubisie abasuubili amakhuwa amalayi mbu baliba nende obukhongo imbeli wa Nyasaye wabu” Abakhayi nibaboola mbu; “Kano shini shiosi shiosi tawe halali obulosi bwahabulafu”

Toto Nyasaye wenyu ni wulia owaloonga likulu nende eshialo khu tsinyanga tsisaasaba, mana naleng’aana khushisala (Arsh), Ye niye ubusinjia amakhuwa koosi, abulaho ulisabila owundi yesi yesi Ye nalamuchamile tawe. Oyo niye Nyasaye, omulesi wenyu, kho mumulaame Ye, koo shimwitsulilanga tawe

Ewuwe ni amulikalukha mwesi, indache ya Nyasaye eyatoto, toto ye niye wachachia ebiloonje naye khandi niye ulibikalusia, kho arunje balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi khubuleng’aafu. Ne balia bakhaya balinyoola ebinywebwa ebia amaatsi kayia pa nende eshinyasio eshilulu khulwa obukhayi bwabu

Ye niye owakhola eliuba okhuba nomubasu, ne omwesi okhuba nobulafu, mana nakurereraho wokhuburira, kho mumanye tsinyanga tsiemika nende obubali (bundi). Toto Nyasaye shiyaloonga ebo tawe halali khubwatoto. Yenoosinjia tsinyaali tsitsie khubandu bamanya
Toto khukhubotokhana eshilo neshitere nende bia Nyasaye yaloonga mwikulu nende mushialo khuli nende ebimanyisio khubandu baritsanga(Nyasaye)
Toto balia balasuubilanga okhubukana ninafu, mana nibachama obulamu bwokhushialo ne nibabubunakhwo, nende balia abang’ang’alanga khu bimanyisio biefu
Abo eshimenyo shiabu shiliba mumulilo khu kalia akabakholanga
Toto balia basuubila mana nibakhola ebikhole ebilayi, Nyasaye wabu alabalunjisia shichila obusuubili bwabu, mwikulu- (Mumikunda) emialo chibura hakari wachio, mumikunda chobwokholo
Amalaamo kabu mwo kaliba “ Oluyali nilwa Nyasaye wefu” Ne amashesanio kabu kaliba “Mulembe” ne amalaamo kabu kokhumalilikha kaliba mbu” Oluyali lwosi ni lwa Nyasaye, Omulesi webilonje biosi.”
